00026 InfoBuffer::InfoBuffer( unsigned int sizeBuffer ) : _buffer( 0 ), _infos( 0 )
00027 {
00028         if( sizeBuffer < DEFAULT_BUFFER_BUFFER_SIZE )
00029         {
00030                 _sizeBuffer = DEFAULT_BUFFER_BUFFER_SIZE;
00031                 Logger::SetMessage( "At the time of creating instance, buffer size is less than DEFAULT size, so it is set as DEFAULT size." ); 
00032         }
00033 
00034         _posBuffer  = 0;
00035         _sizeBuffer = sizeBuffer;
00036         _buffer     = new char [ _sizeBuffer ];
00037         _infos      = new char [ _sizeBuffer ];
00038 
00039         memset( _buffer, 0, sizeof(char) * _sizeBuffer );
00040         memset( _infos,  0, sizeof(char) * _sizeBuffer );
00041 }
00042 
00043 InfoBuffer::~InfoBuffer( void )
00044 {
00045         freeBuffer();
00046 }

00048 void InfoBuffer::initialize( bool willBeToTheDefaultState )
00049 {
00050         _posBuffer = 0;
00051 
00052         if( willBeToTheDefaultState )
00053         {
00054                 if( _sizeBuffer != DEFAULT_BUFFER_BUFFER_SIZE )
00055                 {
00056                         freeBuffer();
00057 
00058                         _sizeBuffer = DEFAULT_BUFFER_BUFFER_SIZE;
00059 
00060                         _buffer = new char [ _sizeBuffer ];
00061                         _infos  = new char [ _sizeBuffer ];
00062                 }
00063         }
00064 
00065         memset( _buffer, 0, sizeof(char) * _sizeBuffer );
00066         memset( _infos,  0, sizeof(char) * _sizeBuffer );
00067 }
00068 
00069 void InfoBuffer::freeBuffer()
00070 {
00071         if ( _buffer != 0 )     delete [] _buffer;
00072         if ( _infos  != 0 )     delete [] _infos;
00073 }

00075 void InfoBuffer::appendInfo( int pos, int indexInfo )
00076 {
00077         while ( _posBuffer + 1 >= _sizeBuffer )
00078         {
00079                 doubleBuffer();
00080         }
00081 
00082         _buffer[ _posBuffer ] = pos;
00083         _infos [ _posBuffer ] = indexInfo;
00084 
00085         _posBuffer++;
00086 }

00088 int InfoBuffer::doubleBuffer()
00089 {
00090         unsigned int sizePreviousBuffer = _sizeBuffer;
00091 
00092         _sizeBuffer *= TWICE;
00093 
00094         char* buffer = new char [ _sizeBuffer ];
00095         char* infos  = new char [ _sizeBuffer ];
00096 
00097         memset( buffer, 0, sizeof(char) * _sizeBuffer );
00098         memset( infos,  0, sizeof(char) * _sizeBuffer );
00099 
00100         memcpy( buffer, _buffer, sizeof(char) * sizePreviousBuffer );
00101         memcpy( infos,  _infos,  sizeof(char) * sizePreviousBuffer );
00102 
00103         if ( _buffer != 0 )     delete [] _buffer;
00104         if ( _infos  != 0 )     delete [] _infos;
00105 
00106         _buffer = buffer;
00107         _infos  = infos;
00108 
00109         return 1;
00110 }

00167 int Buffer::appendBuffer( char* word, unsigned int length )
00168 {
00169         while ( _posBuffer + length + 1 >= _sizeBuffer )
00170         {
00171                 doubleBuffer();
00172         }
00173         memcpy( &_buffer[ _posBuffer ], word, length );
00174         _buffer[ _posBuffer + length + 1 ] = 0;
00175 
00176         _posBuffer += length + 2;
00177 
00178         return 1;
00179 }

00199 const Buffer& Buffer::operator = ( const Buffer& buffer )
00200 {       
00201         if( _sizeBuffer < buffer.getBufferSize() )
00202         {
00203                 freeBuffer();
00204 
00205                 _sizeBuffer = buffer.getBufferSize();
00206 
00207                 _buffer = new char [ _sizeBuffer ];
00208         }
00209 
00210         memcpy( _buffer, buffer.getBufferPtr(), sizeof(char) * buffer.getBufferSize() );
00211 
00212         _posBuffer = buffer.getBufferPos();
00213 
00214         return *this;
00215 }

00224 JEBuffer::JEBuffer( unsigned int size ) : _indexes( 0 ), _tags(0), _infos(0), _codas(0)
00225 {
00226         if( size < DEFAULT_BUFFER_BUFFER_SIZE )
00227         {
00228                 _size = DEFAULT_BUFFER_BUFFER_SIZE;
00229                 Logger::SetMessage( "At the time of creating instance, buffer size is less than DEFAULT size, so it is set as DEFAULT size." ); 
00230         }
00231 
00232         _pos     =  0;
00233         _size    = size;
00234 
00235         _indexes = new unsigned int  [ _size ];
00236         _tags    = new unsigned int  [ _size ];
00237         _infos    = new short   int  [ _size ];
00238         _codas   = new unsigned char [ _size ];
00239 
00240         memset( _indexes, 0, sizeof(unsigned int ) * _size );
00241         memset( _tags,    0, sizeof(unsigned int ) * _size );
00242         memset( _infos,   0, sizeof(short    int ) * _size );
00243         memset( _codas,   0, sizeof(unsigned char) * _size );

00281 int JEBuffer::appendInfo( int pos, unsigned int tag, short int info, unsigned char coda )
00282 {
00283         while ( _pos + 1 >= _size )
00284         {
00285                 doubleJEBuffer();
00286         }
00287 
00288         _indexes[ _pos ] = pos;
00289         _tags   [ _pos ] = tag;
00290         _infos  [ _pos ] = info;
00291         _codas  [ _pos ] = coda;
00292

00294

00298 int JEBuffer::doubleJEBuffer()
00299 {
00300         unsigned int sizePrevious = _size;
00301 
00302         _size *= TWICE;
00303 
00304         unsigned int*  indexes = new unsigned int  [ _size ];
00305         unsigned int*  tags    = new unsigned int  [ _size ];
00306         short    int*  infos   = new short    int  [ _size ];
00307         unsigned char* codas   = new unsigned char [ _size ];
00308 
00309         memset( indexes, 0, sizeof(unsigned int ) * _size );
00310         memset( tags,    0, sizeof(unsigned int ) * _size );
00311         memset( infos,   0, sizeof(short    int ) * _size );
00312         memset( codas,   0, sizeof(unsigned char) * _size );
00313 
00314         memcpy( indexes, _indexes, sizeof(unsigned int)  * sizePrevious );
00315         memcpy( tags,    _tags,    sizeof(unsigned int)  * sizePrevious );
00316         memcpy( infos,   _infos,   sizeof(short    int)  * sizePrevious );
00317         memcpy( codas,   _codas,   sizeof(unsigned char) * sizePrevious );
00318 
00319         freeJEBuffer();
00320 
00321         _indexes = indexes;
00322         _tags    = tags;
00323         _infos   = infos;
00324         _codas   = codas;
00325 
00326         return 1;
00327 }
